content: कांतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कम् भावे क्तिन्] {@--1@} Loveliness, beauty; <ls>Me. 15</ls>; अक्लिष्टकांति <ls>Ś. 5. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Brightness, lustre, brilliance; <ls>Me. 84.</ls> {@--3@} Personal decoration or embellishment. {@--4@} Wish, desire. {@--5@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Beauty enhanced by love; (<ls>S. D.</ls> thus distinguishes कांति from शोभा and दीप्तिः - रूपयौवनलालित्यं भोगाद्यैरंगभूषणं . शोभा प्रोक्ता सैव कांतिर्मन्मथाप्यायिता द्युतिः . कांतिरेवातिविस्तीर्णा दीप्तिरित्यभिधीयते <ls n="S. D.">130</ls>, <ls n="S. D.">131</ls>). {@--6@} A lovely or desirable woman. {@--7@} An epithet of Durgā. {@--8@} A digit of the moon.
